Articles.Content: Hi, I'm not new in Kerbal, but i'm new in the forum. I've been playing since .22 version, and I'm very proud and happy about the 1.0 release, I love that game and the space also I'm a Scout, and I'm studying audiovisual production. I've decided to post a New Thread to say Hello, present myself and ask for other catalan and spanish players.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):D
Hello, and welcome to the forum. I am neither Spanish nor Catalan. However, there is a [place where you can find them](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/60-Spanish).
Welcome! You might want to check out the Scouting Compilation thread in the Space Lounge.

Thank you, Dman979, I'll do but I think that in my country the scouts are very diferent from yours, if i'm not wrong.

Anyways, it's good to know about scouts from other countries!

Hello! I'm not Catalan or Spanish, but I'm learning Spanish and I can get the gist of your post in the Spanish subforum.

Hope you enjoy these forums!
